* '''December 31, 2020''' &mdash; Fixes an issue whereby if the [[Cryo Cicin]]s summoned by a [[Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage]] are defeated while Frozen or Petrified, the Cryo Cicin Mage no longer summons Cryo Cicins and continuously uses her shield skill.
